author: Cleo Abram
description:
This is a new eye implant that’s giving people back their sight! And it could save your eyesight when you get older... 

The patients all had cells at the back of their eye that died because of an age-related disease, but doctors implanted a tiiiiiny microchip connecting to a pair of glasses with a camera on the front

It takes in images, processes them, sends it to the implant, then to the brain, giving people back their sight.

For more optimistic science and tech stories, subscribe!

#science #tech #eyes #medicine #shorts
title: New Eye Implant Might Save Your Eyesight
